name: CRLF Injection Scanner
description: Detects CRLF injection vulnerabilities allowing HTTP header injection and response splitting
author: Dominator Team
cwe_name: Improper Neutralization of CRLF Sequences ('CRLF Injection')
remediation: Sanitize all user input that appears in HTTP headers. Remove or encode CR (\r) and LF (\n) characters. Use framework-provided header setting methods.
